AddTagsToResource.name: AddTagsToResource
AddTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for a specified AWS resource

CancelCommand.name: CancelCommand
CancelCommand.description: Grants permission to cancel a specified Run Command command

CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution.name: CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution
CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress maintenance window execution

CreateActivation.name: CreateActivation
CreateActivation.description:
Grants permission to create an activation that is used to register on-premises servers
                                                and virtual machines (VMs) with Systems Manager

CreateAssociation.name: CreateAssociation
CreateAssociation.description:
Grants permission to associate a specified Systems Manager document with specified
                                                instances or other targets

CreateAssociationBatch.name: CreateAssociationBatch
CreateAssociationBatch.description:
Grants permission to combine entries for multiple CreateAssociation operations in
                                                a single command

CreateDocument.name: CreateDocument
CreateDocument.description: Grants permission to create a Systems Manager SSM document

CreateMaintenanceWindow.name: CreateMaintenanceWindow
CreateMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to create a maintenance window

CreateOpsItem.name: CreateOpsItem
CreateOpsItem.description: Grants permission to create an OpsItem in OpsCenter

CreatePatchBaseline.name: CreatePatchBaseline
CreatePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to create a patch baseline

CreateResourceDataSync.name: CreateResourceDataSync
CreateResourceDataSync.description:
Grants permission to create a resource data sync configuration, which regularly collects
                                                inventory data from managed instances and updates the data in an Amazon S3 bucket

DeleteActivation.name: DeleteActivation
DeleteActivation.description: Grants permission to delete a specified activation for managed instances

DeleteAssociation.name: DeleteAssociation
DeleteAssociation.description: Grants permission to disassociate a specified SSM document from a specified instance

DeleteDocument.name: DeleteDocument
DeleteDocument.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM document and its instance associations

DeleteInventory.name: DeleteInventory
DeleteInventory.description:
Grants permission to delete a specified custom inventory type, or the data associated
                                                with a custom inventory type

DeleteMaintenanceWindow.name: DeleteMaintenanceWindow
DeleteMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to delete a specified maintenance window

DeleteParameter.name: DeleteParameter
DeleteParameter.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM parameter

DeleteParameters.name: DeleteParameters
DeleteParameters.description: Grants permission to delete multiple specified SSM parameters

DeletePatchBaseline.name: DeletePatchBaseline
DeletePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to delete a specified patch baseline

DeleteResourceDataSync.name: DeleteResourceDataSync
DeleteResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to delete a specified resource data sync

DeregisterManagedInstance.name: DeregisterManagedInstance
DeregisterManagedInstance.description:
Grants permission to deregister a specified on-premises server or virtual machine
                                                (VM) from Systems Manager

DeregisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.name: DeregisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
DeregisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description:
Grants permission to deregister a specified patch baseline from being the default
                                                patch baseline for a specified patch group

DeregisterTargetFromMaintenanceWindow.name: DeregisterTargetFromMaintenanceWindow
DeregisterTargetFromMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified target from a maintenance window

DeregisterTaskFromMaintenanceWindow.name: DeregisterTaskFromMaintenanceWindow
DeregisterTaskFromMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified task from a maintenance window

DescribeActivations.name: DescribeActivations
DescribeActivations.description:
Grants permission to view details about a specified managed instance activation, such
                                                as when it was created and the number of instances registered using the activation

DescribeAssociation.name: DescribeAssociation
DescribeAssociation.description:
Grants permission to view details about the specified association for a specified
                                                instance or target

DescribeAssociationExecutionTargets.name: DescribeAssociationExecutionTargets
DescribeAssociationExecutionTargets.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified association execution

DescribeAssociationExecutions.name: DescribeAssociationExecutions
DescribeAssociationExecutions.description: Grants permission to view all executions for a specified association

DescribeAutomationExecutions.name: DescribeAutomationExecutions
DescribeAutomationExecutions.description: Grants permission to view details about all active and terminated Automation executions

DescribeAutomationStepExecutions.name: DescribeAutomationStepExecutions
DescribeAutomationStepExecutions.description:
Grants permission to view information about all active and terminated step executions
                                                in an Automation workflow

DescribeAvailablePatches.name: DescribeAvailablePatches
DescribeAvailablePatches.description: Grants permission to view all patches eligible to include in a patch baseline

DescribeDocument.name: DescribeDocument
DescribeDocument.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM document

DescribeDocumentParameters.name: DescribeDocumentParameters
DescribeDocumentParameters.description:
Grants permission to display information about SSM document parameters in the Systems
                                                Manager console (internal Systems Manager action)

DescribeDocumentPermission.name: DescribeDocumentPermission
DescribeDocumentPermission.description: Grants permission to view the permissions for a specified SSM document

DescribeEffectiveInstanceAssociations.name: DescribeEffectiveInstanceAssociations
DescribeEffectiveInstanceAssociations.description: Grants permission to view all current associations for a specified instance

DescribeEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline.name: DescribeEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline
DescribeEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline.description:
Grants permission to view details about the patches currently associated with the
                                                specified patch baseline (Windows only)

DescribeInstanceAssociationsStatus.name: DescribeInstanceAssociationsStatus
DescribeInstanceAssociationsStatus.description: Grants permission to view the status of the associations for a specified instance

DescribeInstanceInformation.name: DescribeInstanceInformation
DescribeInstanceInformation.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified instance

DescribeInstancePatchStates.name: DescribeInstancePatchStates
DescribeInstancePatchStates.description: Grants permission to view status details about patches on a specified instance

DescribeInstancePatchStatesForPatchGroup.name: DescribeInstancePatchStatesForPatchGroup
DescribeInstancePatchStatesForPatchGroup.description:
Grants permission to describe the high-level patch state for the instances in the
                                                specified patch group

DescribeInstancePatches.name: DescribeInstancePatches
DescribeInstancePatches.description: Grants permission to view general details about the patches on a specified instance

DescribeInstanceProperties.name: DescribeInstanceProperties
DescribeInstanceProperties.description: Grants permission to user's Amazon EC2 console to render managed instances' nodes

DescribeInventoryDeletions.name: DescribeInventoryDeletions
DescribeInventoryDeletions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified inventory deletion

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskIn.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocations
DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskIn.description:
Grants permission to view details of a specified task execution for a maintenance
                                                window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks
DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks.description:
Grants permission to view details about the tasks that ran during a specified maintenance
                                                window execution

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions
DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions.description: Grants permission to view the executions of a specified maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowSchedule.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowSchedule
DescribeMaintenanceWindowSchedule.description:
Grants permission to view details about upcoming executions of a specified maintenance
                                                window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets
DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets.description:
Grants permission to view a list of the targets associated with a specified maintenance
                                                window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks
DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks.description:
Grants permission to view a list of the tasks associated with a specified maintenance
                                                window

DescribeMaintenanceWindows.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindows
DescribeMaintenanceWindows.description: Grants permission to view information about all or specified maintenance windows

DescribeMaintenanceWindowsForTarget.name: DescribeMaintenanceWindowsForTarget
DescribeMaintenanceWindowsForTarget.description:
Grants permission to view information about the maintenance window targets and tasks
                                                associated with a specified instance

DescribeOpsItems.name: DescribeOpsItems
DescribeOpsItems.description: Grants permission to view details about specified OpsItems

DescribeParameters.name: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM parameter

DescribePatchBaselines.name: DescribePatchBaselines
DescribePatchBaselines.description:
Grants permission to view information about patch baselines that meet the specified
                                                criteria

DescribePatchGroupState.name: DescribePatchGroupState
DescribePatchGroupState.description:
Grants permission to view aggregated status details for patches for a specified patch
                                                group

DescribePatchGroups.name: DescribePatchGroups
DescribePatchGroups.description:
Grants permission to view information about the patch baseline for a specified patch
                                                group

DescribePatchProperties.name: DescribePatchProperties
DescribePatchProperties.description:
Grants permission to view details of available patches for a specified operating system
                                                and patch property

DescribeSessions.name: DescribeSessions
DescribeSessions.description:
Grants permission to view a list of recent Session Manager sessions that meet the
                                                specified search criteria

GetAutomationExecution.name: GetAutomationExecution
GetAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to view details of a specified Automation execution

GetCalendarState.name: GetCalendarState
GetCalendarState.description:
Grants permission to view the calendar state for a change calendar or a list of change
                                                calendars

GetCommandInvocation.name: GetCommandInvocation
GetCommandInvocation.description:
Grants permission to view details about the command execution of a specified invocation
                                                or plugin

GetConnectionStatus.name: GetConnectionStatus
GetConnectionStatus.description:
Grants permission to view the Session Manager connection status for a specified managed
                                                instance

GetDefaultPatchBaseline.name: GetDefaultPatchBaseline
GetDefaultPatchBaseline.description:
Grants permission to view the current default patch baseline for a specified operating
                                                system type

GetDeployablePatchSnapshotForInstance.name: GetDeployablePatchSnapshotForInstance
GetDeployablePatchSnapshotForInstance.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the current patch baseline snapshot for a specified
                                                instance

GetDocument.name: GetDocument
GetDocument.description: Grants permission to view the contents of a specified SSM document

GetInventory.name: GetInventory
GetInventory.description: Grants permission to view instance inventory details per the specified criteria

GetInventorySchema.name: GetInventorySchema
GetInventorySchema.description:
Grants permission to view a list of inventory types or attribute names for a specified
                                                inventory item type

GetMaintenanceWindow.name: GetMaintenanceWindow
GetMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window

GetMaintenanceWindowExecution.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecution
GetMaintenanceWindowExecution.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution

GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTask.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTask
GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTask.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution task

GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocat.name: GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocation
GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocat.description:
Grants permission to view details about a specific maintenance window task running
                                                on a specific target

GetMaintenanceWindowTask.name: GetMaintenanceWindowTask
GetMaintenanceWindowTask.description:
Grants permission to view details about tasks registered with a specified maintenance
                                                window

GetManifest.name: GetManifest
GetManifest.description:
Used by Systems Manager and SSM Agent to determine package installation requirements
                                                for an instance (internal Systems Manager call)

GetOpsItem.name: GetOpsItem
GetOpsItem.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified OpsItem

GetOpsSummary.name: GetOpsSummary
GetOpsSummary.description:
Grants permission to view summary information about OpsItems based on specified filters
                                                and aggregators

GetParameter.name: GetParameter
GetParameter.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified parameter

GetParameterHistory.name: GetParameterHistory
GetParameterHistory.description: Grants permission to view details and changes for a specified parameter

GetParameters.name: GetParameters
GetParameters.description: Grants permission to view information about multiple specified parameters

GetParametersByPath.name: GetParametersByPath
GetParametersByPath.description: Grants permission to view information about parameters in a specified hierarchy

GetPatchBaseline.name: GetPatchBaseline
GetPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified patch baseline

GetPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.name: GetPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
GetPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description:
Grants permission to view the ID of the current patch baseline for a specified patch
                                                group

GetServiceSetting.name: GetServiceSetting
GetServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to view the account-level setting for an AWS service

LabelParameterVersion.name: LabelParameterVersion
LabelParameterVersion.description: Grants permission to apply an identifying label to a specified version of a parameter

ListAssociationVersions.name: ListAssociationVersions
ListAssociationVersions.description: Grants permission to list versions of the specified association

ListAssociations.name: ListAssociations
ListAssociations.description:
Grants permission to list the associations for a specified SSM document or managed
                                                instance

ListCommandInvocations.name: ListCommandInvocations
ListCommandInvocations.description:
Grants permission to list information about command invocations sent to a specified
                                                instance

ListCommands.name: ListCommands
ListCommands.description: Grants permission to list the commands sent to a specified instance

ListComplianceItems.name: ListComplianceItems
ListComplianceItems.description:
Grants permission to list compliance status for specified resource types on a specified
                                                resource

ListComplianceSummaries.name: ListComplianceSummaries
ListComplianceSummaries.description:
Grants permission to list a summary count of compliant and noncompliant resources
                                                for a specified compliance type

ListDocumentVersions.name: ListDocumentVersions
ListDocumentVersions.description: Grants permission to list all versions of a specified document

ListDocuments.name: ListDocuments
ListDocuments.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified SSM document

ListInstanceAssociations.name: ListInstanceAssociations
ListInstanceAssociations.description:
Used by SSM Agent to check for new State Manager associations (internal Systems Manager
                                                call)

ListInventoryEntries.name: ListInventoryEntries
ListInventoryEntries.description: Grants permission to view a list of specified inventory types for a specified instance

ListResourceComplianceSummaries.name: ListResourceComplianceSummaries
ListResourceComplianceSummaries.description: Grants permission to list resource-level summary count

ListResourceDataSync.name: ListResourceDataSync
ListResourceDataSync.description:
Grants permission to list information about resource data sync configurations in an
                                                account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for a specified resource

ModifyDocumentPermission.name: ModifyDocumentPermission
ModifyDocumentPermission.description:
Grants permission to share a custom SSM document publicly or privately with specified
                                                AWS accounts

PutComplianceItems.name: PutComplianceItems
PutComplianceItems.description:
Grants permission to register a compliance type and other compliance details on a
                                                specified resource

PutConfigurePackageResult.name: PutConfigurePackageResult
PutConfigurePackageResult.description:
Used by SSM Agent to generate a report of the results of specific agent requests (internal
                                                Systems Manager call)

PutInventory.name: PutInventory
PutInventory.description: Grants permission to add or update inventory items on multiple specified managed instances

PutParameter.name: PutParameter
PutParameter.description: Grants permission to create an SSM parameter

RegisterDefaultPatchBaseline.name: RegisterDefaultPatchBaseline
RegisterDefaultPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for an operating system type

RegisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.name: RegisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup
RegisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for a specified patch group

RegisterTargetWithMaintenanceWindow.name: RegisterTargetWithMaintenanceWindow
RegisterTargetWithMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to register a target with a specified maintenance window

RegisterTaskWithMaintenanceWindow.name: RegisterTaskWithMaintenanceWindow
RegisterTaskWithMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to register a task with a specified maintenance window

RemoveTagsFromResource.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
RemoveTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove a specified tag key from a specified resource

ResetServiceSetting.name: ResetServiceSetting
ResetServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to reset the service setting for an AWS account to the default value

ResumeSession.name: ResumeSession
ResumeSession.description: Grants permission to reconnect a Session Manager session to a managed instance

SendAutomationSignal.name: SendAutomationSignal
SendAutomationSignal.description:
Grants permission to send a signal to change the current behavior or status of a specified
                                                Automation execution

SendCommand.name: SendCommand
SendCommand.description: Grants permission to run commands on one or more specified managed instances

StartAssociationsOnce.name: StartAssociationsOnce
StartAssociationsOnce.description: Grants permission to run a specified association manually

StartAutomationExecution.name: StartAutomationExecution
StartAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of an Automation document

StartSession.name: StartSession
StartSession.description:
Grants permission to initiate a connection to a specified target for a Session Manager
                                                session

StopAutomationExecution.name: StopAutomationExecution
StopAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to stop a specified Automation execution that is already in progress

TerminateSession.name: TerminateSession
TerminateSession.description: Grants permission to permanently end a Session Manager connection to an instance.

UpdateAssociation.name: UpdateAssociation
UpdateAssociation.description:
Grants permission to update an association and immediately run the association on
                                                the specified targets

UpdateAssociationStatus.name: UpdateAssociationStatus
UpdateAssociationStatus.description:
Grants permission to update the status of the SSM document associated with a specified
                                                instance

UpdateDocument.name: UpdateDocument
UpdateDocument.description: Grants permission to update one or more values for an SSM document

UpdateDocumentDefaultVersion.name: UpdateDocumentDefaultVersion
UpdateDocumentDefaultVersion.description: Grants permission to change the default version of an SSM document

UpdateInstanceAssociationStatus.name: UpdateInstanceAssociationStatus
UpdateInstanceAssociationStatus.description:
Used by SSM Agent to update the status of the association that it is currently running
                                                (internal Systems Manager call)

UpdateInstanceInformation.name: UpdateInstanceInformation
UpdateInstanceInformation.description:
Used by SSM Agent to send a heartbeat signal to the Systems Manager service in the
                                                cloud

UpdateMaintenanceWindow.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindow
UpdateMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window

UpdateMaintenanceWindowTarget.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindowTarget
UpdateMaintenanceWindowTarget.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window target

UpdateMaintenanceWindowTask.name: UpdateMaintenanceWindowTask
UpdateMaintenanceWindowTask.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window task

UpdateManagedInstanceRole.name: UpdateManagedInstanceRole
UpdateManagedInstanceRole.description:
Grants permission to assign or change the IAM role assigned to a specified managed
                                                instance

UpdateOpsItem.name: UpdateOpsItem
UpdateOpsItem.description: Grants permission to edit or change an OpsItem

UpdatePatchBaseline.name: UpdatePatchBaseline
UpdatePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to update a specified patch baseline

UpdateResourceDataSync.name: UpdateResourceDataSync
UpdateResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to update a resource data sync

UpdateServiceSetting.name: UpdateServiceSetting
UpdateServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to update the service setting for an AWS account
